articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Concluding Speech at First Conference of Chairpersons of WPK Primary Committees
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Concluding Speech at First Conference of Chairpersons of WPK Primary Committees
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a concluding speech "On Strengthening the Primary Party Committees" at the 3rd-day meeting of the First Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Committees of the WPK on Sunday.
					 He said that the Central Committee of the WPK convened the Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Party Committees for the first time in its history in keeping with the requirement of the developing revolution and attached importance to the conference as much as to the Party Congress.
					
					 He referred to some important matters arising in improving and strengthening the work of the primary Party committees in the future.
					
					 He underscored the great importance of the position and role of the primary Party committees in further developing the WPK into the great Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party as required by the new era of the Juche revolution and energetically promoting the building of a powerful socialist country. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Only when the primary Party committees are strengthened, is it possible to train all party members as genuine Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists faithful to the idea and leadership of the WPK and develop the Party into a revolutionary party with the invincible might by consolidating its foundation. 
					
					 To strengthen the primary Party committees and increase their militancy now presents itself as a more urgent issue in the struggle to smash the ever-more undisguised and persistent anti-socialist moves of the imperialists and all other hostile forces, carry out the line of modeling the whole Party on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism laid down at the Seventh Congress of the WPK and accomplish the socialist cause of Juche.
					
					 The primary Party organizations should consolidate themselves to be the most elite militant ranks in line with the Party Central Committee's intention of attaching importance to them and powerfully mobilize the officials, Party members and other working people to the drive for carrying out the cause of building a powerful socialist country and thus usher in a new heyday in strengthening the primary Party committees.
					
					 The basic duty of the primary Party organizations at present is to creditably fulfill their responsibility and role as the main militant sub-unit of the WPK in the struggle for implementing the decision of the Seventh Congress of the WPK under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The primary Party organizations should, first of all, satisfactorily perform their mission and duty as a political staff at the relevant units in the drive for implementing the ideas of the Party and upholding its policies.
					
					 They should focus their efforts on carrying out the Party's policies and the main revolutionary tasks facing their own sectors and units, in particular.
					
					 The primary Party organizations in the field of supply service of the armed forces including the People's Army should conduct the party work in a dynamic and militant manner and make positive contributions to further improving the standard of living of the service personnel. 
					
					 All the primary Party organizations should thoroughly carry out the military tasks facing their units, true to the Party's line of prioritizing military affairs.
					
					 If they are to successfully carry out their revolutionary tasks, they should increase the self-development capability to the maximum, considering the mental power of the masses, science and technology and supply service as a main link in the chain efforts.
					
					 They should sincerely help and encourage the administrative and economic officials as a party work so that they may creditably perform their duties in carrying out their revolutionary tasks.
					
					 They should direct big efforts to the internal party work, holding fast to the work to establish the unitary leadership system of the Party as a main line, and thus increase the militancy of the Party and the revolutionary ranks in every way.
					
					 Vigilance should be heightened against the enemies' moves to destabilize our society and all sorts of unsound practices disturbing people's mind-set and a struggle be intensified against them.
					
					 A proper guidance should be given to the work of the working people's organizations so that they may creditably play their role as the transmission belts and peripheral organizations of the Party.
					
					 Big efforts should be channeled into guiding the work of the Youth League, in particular, so that its organizations may fully demonstrate their might as the advancing group and a wing of the Party in the struggle to implement the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Party.
					
					 The main point in the rural ri-Party committees' work at present is to strengthen the base in the socialist rural areas politico-ideologically and attain without fail the goal of agricultural production set by the Party.
					
					 For the primary Party committees to creditably discharge the mission and duty they assumed before the Party and the revolution, their chairpersons should decisively enhance their responsibility and role.
					
					 Departments of the Party Central Committee and the provincial, city and county Party committees and those Party committees performing similar functions should put main emphasis on the work for strengthening primary Party organizations, true to the Party's idea and policy of prioritizing and strengthening them.
					
					 It is necessary to raise a strong wind for decisively combating administrative bureaucratic tendencies in the Party work.
					
					 Kim Jong Un appealed to the participants of the conference and the chairpersons of the primary committees of the WPK to devote themselves to the great Party and the great people and to the victory of the sacred cause of the Juche revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Closing Address at 1st Conference of Chairpersons of Primary Committees of WPK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Closing Address at 1st Conference of Chairpersons of Primary Committees of WPK
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), guided the 1st Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Committees of the WPK, which took place from Dec. 23 to 25, and made a closing address.
					 Kim Jong Un said that the conference had a serious discussion on important issues arising in strengthening the primary party committees and enhancing their function and role in every way.
					
					 The conference renewed and reconfirmed the important position and role of the primary party committees in the Party work and accomplishment of the cause of socialism and fully demonstrated the strong faith and will to consolidate the invincible might and fighting efficiency of the WPK in every way and hasten the building of a socialist power by enhancing the role of the primary party organizations, he noted.
					
					 Saying that he was pleased to see the perfect conference as required by the development of the WPK and revolution, he extended his warm thanks to all its participants for making positive efforts to ensure its successful holding and to all the party members and other people.
					
					 He said that the 1st Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Committees of the WPK will shine long in the history of the WPK as the significant conference of glory which opened up a shortcut to developing the WPK into the great Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Party and accomplishing the cause of socialism.
					
					 Noting that it is the main spirit of the conference to cement the primary party committees as invincible ranks, raise their fighting efficiency in every way and thus effect an epoch-making change in the struggle to strengthen the WPK and implement the decision of its 7th Congress, he called on all the chairpersons of the primary party committees to deep bear in mind the spirit and thoroughly apply it, so as to bring about a revolutionary upswing in the Party work and building of the socialist power.
					
					 He said that the participants in the conference should become standard-bearers and tenacious practitioners for the general offensive, who make a breakthrough at the worksite of building a socialist power, to make uninterrupted innovations and advances at their units in the spirit and stamina displayed in the 200-day campaign.
					
					 The WPK believes in and relies on broad masses of people in the course of struggle which has a long way to go, faces huge tasks and takes on arduousness as ever due to the obstructive maneuvers of all the hostile forces, he said, and set his great hope to the primary party committees and their chairpersons that have carried out the Party's line and policy by properly mobilizing the inexhaustible might of the popular masses.
					
					 Expressing belief that a fresh turn would be made in the development of the WPK and building of a socialist power thanks to the devoted efforts of the participants of the conference and the chairpersons of primary party committees, Kim Jong Un declared the conference closed.

articles.title: First Conference of Chairpersons of WPK Primary Committees Closes
articles.content:
First Conference of Chairpersons of WPK Primary Committees Closes
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The First Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Committees of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) closed on December 25, rounding off its work with success.
					 Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, guided the third-day meeting of the conference.
					
					 Speeches were made at the conference.
					
					 The speakers referred to the successes and experience gained in the course of cementing the single-minded unity as firm as a rock and enhancing the function and role of the Party organizations.
					
					 They unanimously stressed that they got to bear deeper in their mind the truth that the whole Party can be strengthened and the victory of the revolutionary cause achieved when the primary Party organizations, the principal combat units of the Party, are strengthened as clarified by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and as taught by Chairman of the WPK Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They noted that primary Party organizations have achieved successes in the drive to carry out the behests of the great leaders and implement the Party's policies by meticulously organizing and guiding the party life of their members and prioritizing the ideological work to give fullest play to the mental power of the masses.
					
					 They said that primary Party organizations have done their best in their guidance over the work of the youth league and in educating the youth, true to the Party's idea of prioritizing the youth, so as to stoutly train the rising generation into creditable pillars and masters of the Paektusan youth power who are capable of carrying forward the traditions of loyalty at their units.
					
					 They also noted that the primary Party committees have put the focus of their work on helping everyone benefit from the noble intention of the Party and its popular policies of giving top priority to the interests and convenience of the people and holding them absolute so that the songs of gratitude for the Party and hurrah for the Workers' Party are ringing out louder from among them.
					
					 Defects and deviations witnessed in the work of some basic party organizations were criticized and steps were taken to tackle them at the conference.
					
					 The speakers expressed their strong will to tangibly contribute to modeling the entire Party and the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism by remarkably increasing the combat efficiency of the primary Party organizations, true to the intention of the Party Central Committee which arranged the Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Committees of the WPK, the field commanders of the Party, in the crucial historic period of carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a concluding speech.
					
					 Receiving the important guidelines from the Chairman of the WPK, the participants of the conference deeply felt their high honor and sense of responsibility that they are directly in charge of making a breakthrough in the drive to implement the decision of the Seventh Congress of the WPK by making a decisive turn in the work of the primary Party organizations as required by the new era of the Juche revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a closing address.
					
					 The First Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Committees of the WPK, the first of its kind since the Seventh Congress of the WPK, was a grand meeting of weighty significance that marked a historic milestone in further strengthening the WPK into the great Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Party, lively and militant, and hastening the building of a socialist power.
					
					 The conference guided by Chairman of the WPK Kim Jong Un will be eternally recorded in the history of the WPK as a conference for revolutionary general advance as it greatly encouraged all the Party members, service personnel and other people who are dashing ahead like the wind toward the building of a socialist power and the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the guidance of the WPK.

articles.title: Participants in First Conference of Chairpersons of WPK Primary Committees Enjoy Art Performances
articles.content:
Participants in First Conference of Chairpersons of WPK Primary Committees Enjoy Art Performances
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The participants in the First Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Committees of the Workers' Party of Korea enjoyed art performances at theatres here.
					 Musical epic "Songun March of General" was given at the Ponghwa Art Theatre. 
					
					 The performance began with narration and music "General, Please Receive Our Reports". The performers highly praised the revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers showing the devoted efforts of Kim Jong Il, who had made a ceaseless journey of Songun for the beloved country and people, always going in simple jumper despite snow and rain.
					
					 A revolutionary opera "Victory of the Revolution Is in Sight" was given at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 The opera represents the struggle of an anti-Japanese war woman fighter who gave the enemies the creeps by shouting at her last moments that the victory of the revolution is in sight as there is Kim Il Sung, the sun of the nation. It made the audience feel what the faith of a true revolutionary is.
					
					 A drama "Blood Vessel" was given at the National Theatre. The drama deals with the struggle of the workers of the Sangwon Cement Complex.
					
					 The participants also enjoyed an acrobatic performance of the National Circus at the Pyongyang Circus Theater.
					
					 Meanwhile, they toured the Nature Museum and the Central Zoo.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Russian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Russian President
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of sympathy to Russian President V.V. Putin as regards the crash of a Syria-bound airliner with the Russian Army Academic Song and Dance Ensemble Named after Alexandrov aboard that caused many causalities.
					 Kim in the message expressed deep consolation and sympathy to the Russian president and the victims and their bereaved families, heartily hoping that the sorrow of the bereaved families would be healed and rest would come to them as early as possible.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
Chongjin, December 26 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a centenarian birthday spread to Jon Kum San, a woman living in Pangjin-dong, Chongam District, Chongjin City of North Hamgyong Province.
					 Born into a poor peasant family, Jon had to experience all sorts of maltreatment and contempt as a member of the stateless nation. It was after the liberation of Korea by President Kim Il Sung that she could lead a genuine life as a master of the country.
					
					 She had long worked hard as an agricultural worker, and is still now living an optimistic life in good health.

articles.title: Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Art Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- An art exhibition dealing with the campaign conducted in the DPRK to recover the flood-hit areas of North Hamgyong Province was opened at the Pyongyang International House of Culture on Monday.
					 On display there are more than 70 fine art works, including Korean paintings, oil paintings and embroideries, produced by artists across the country.
					
					 The art works vividly show the struggle of the army and people who turned out in the recovery efforts in response to the Workers' Party of Korea's call for winning the miraculous victory in a drive to convert misfortune into favorable conditions on the front of recovering from flood damage.
					
					 Among them are paintings showing new streets and villages successfully built in the flood-hit areas and happy schoolchildren of the areas on the way to camping.
					
					 Officials in the field of the culture and arts and working citizens in Pyongyang looked round the exhibition.
					
					 The art exhibition lasts until January 5 next year.

articles.title: Workers, Trade Union Members Meet
articles.content:
Workers, Trade Union Members Meet
Songrim, December 26 (KCNA) -- Workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) held a meeting at the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex Monday to celebrate the fifth anniversary of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Attending it were officials concerned and workers and trade union officials and members of the complex.
					
					 Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., GFTUK, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers noted that Kim Jong Un, who made long journey for Songun together with leader Kim Jong Il, enjoying deep trust and respect from the army and people, has wisely led the party, the state and the army to usher in the new era of victory and changes that would shine long in the history of the country.
					
					 They stressed that he gave the working class the noble title of the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class and has led the work to develop the GFTUK into an organization of the great leaders.
					
					 They called for a dynamic struggle to hasten the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of the Songun revolution, rallied closer around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Seethes with Enthusiasm for Sports in 2016
articles.content:
DPRK Seethes with Enthusiasm for Sports in 2016
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK seethes with the enthusiasm for mass sports all the year round.
					 A group running of officials of the ministries and national institutions started on the first day of sports this year, leading to colorful mass sports activities in provinces, cities and counties.
					
					 Sports contest of officials of the complexes in Pyongyang and sports contest of officials in the field of education were held amid the great concern of the cheers on the threshold of the Day of the Shining Star and the Day of the Sun.
					
					 There took place the swimming contest of officials of the commissions, ministries and national institutions held in the months for maritime physical culture, July and August, and the tennis and table tennis contests.
					
					 A football tournament of officials of ministries and national institutions held for the first time this year gave deep impression to many experts and sports fans as the footballers demonstrated their resolute perseverance, endurance and collectivist spirit.
					
					 The 13th People's Games (amateurs teams) encouraged all the people to implementing the plan of the Workers' Party of Korea for building a sports power.
					
					 The strong sense of organization and discipline and fair play were displayed at the national workers sports contest, the 4th sports contest among public health workers, the 47th sports contest of artistes and other sports contests. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the mass sports activities were brisk among school youth and children. The 42nd national schoolchildren's sports contest for Jongilbong prize, the 6th national tournament of football classes, a national university students sports contest for September 5 prize and a Taedong River crossing competition of school youth and children in Pyongyang City took place this year.
					
					 More than 70 units in Pyongyang joined the ranks of model sports units.

articles.title: Kang Pan Sok and Anti-Japanese Women's Association
articles.content:
Kang Pan Sok and Anti-Japanese Women's Association
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- It has been ninety years since Kang Pan Sok, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, formed the Anti-Japanese Women's Association on December 26, Juche 15 (1926) under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The association was the first Juche-type revolutionary women's organization in Korea which regarded the President's idea on women's emancipation as its guideline and was struggled to carry it out.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, in his early years, clarified the issue of the position and role of the women in the revolutionary struggle, saying that the women's organization should be formed to retake their genuine right and freedom.
					
					 True to his idea on the movement for women's emancipation, Kang Pan Sok, mother of the President, conducted energetic activities to form genuine revolutionary organization of women.
					
					 She formed the Anti-Japanese Women's Association under the active guidance and help of the President and led broad sections of women to the struggle for national and social emancipation.

articles.title: Single-hearted Unity Fully Demonstrated in DPRK in 2016
articles.content:
Single-hearted Unity Fully Demonstrated in DPRK in 2016
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The invincible single-hearted unity of the leader, the party and the masses has been demonstrated in the DPRK in Juche 105 (2016).
					 An enlarged joint meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean People's Army Committee of the WPK took place in February for the first time in the history of the WPK. The joint meeting marked an important occasion in further strengthening the Party into the motherly Party which shares its fate with popular masses and consolidating a harmonious whole between the Party and the people as firm as a rock.
					
					 The historic Seventh Congress of the WPK, the Ninth Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, the Seventh Congress of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and the Sixth Congress of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea were held in success, cementing the organizational and ideological unity in which all people have been united as one.
					
					 The Korean people have brought about world-startling miracles one after another this year by dint of the might of the harmonious whole that the Party believes in the people and the people absolutely trust and follow the Party.
					
					 Victory in the historic 70-day campaign and the 200-day campaign for making a breakthrough for implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development would be unthinkable apart from the single-hearted unity.
					
					 The drive for recovering from flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province during the 200-day campaign fully demonstrated the revolutionary climate of the Workers' Party of Korea which makes selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people and consolidated the blood ties between the Party and the masses in every way.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK built more than 11 900 dwelling houses, schools, kindergartens and nurseries in cities and counties of the province in a short span of time through the great army-people unity.
					
					 All these are attributable to the might of the single-hearted unity of Juche Korea that the army and people are turning out as one to flatten even a mountain and empty a sea true to the call of the Party.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Reveals Filthy Nature of Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Reveals Filthy Nature of Park Geun Hye Regime
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye regime is in a pretty fix due to sexual scandals that break out nonstop inside and outside south Korea.
					 A south Korean puppet diplomat working in Chile busied himself making public a letter of apology and facing justice after a video dealing with his sexual assault on a minor of the country was posted on internet. The incumbent ambassador to a Mid-east country was revealed to have been punished on charges of sexually molesting a woman employee earlier in August. This has disgraced south Korea so much, making them unable to even go out.
					
					 The series of hideous corruption and irregularities are witnessed among high-ranking officials and all kinds of sexual scandals are rampant in society. This has become a frequent occurrence even among puppet diplomats. This proves the nature of the filthy Park regime.
					
					 Muddy spring will have muddy streams. Those who have become immoral under Park can not behave otherwise.
					
					 Park in her early 20s had had secret love affairs with Choe Thae Min, a man 40 years older than her. Sexual scandals disclosed in the puppet regime are just a tip of iceberg.
					
					 Sexual scandals run through the Park regime's diplomacy. Yun Chang Jung, former spokesman for Chongwadae, when he accompanied Park during her first junket in May 2013, was reported to have had an indecent sexual conduct with a south Korean woman in her 20s residing in the U.S., an intern at the south Korean puppet embassy in the U.S. He exposed himself to public disgrace and was dismissed from the post.
					
					 South Korean diplomats who were punished for sexual scandals number five this year and three out of ten diplomats who were punished for the past five years are reported to have been related with sexual affairs.
					
					 The sex-related crimes, committed within the puppet army, climbed to 66 percent during the Park regime.
					
					  Like master, like man. All the sexual scandals disclosed one after another have something in common with the political scandal harassing the Park regime.
					
					 This proves that the regime should have taken to the garbage ground of history long ago.
					
					 Irony is that this regime is fooling around in a bid to tarnish the dignified DPRK. 
					
					 It is the height of folly for the matchless hooligans and yes-men of the coarse regime to point an accusing finger at others.
					
					 Having any dealings with the indecent regime will only bring shame and disgrace.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il for Building Juche-oriented Revolutionary Armed Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il for Building Juche-oriented Revolutionary Armed Forces
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Monday carries an editorial on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA on December 24, Juche 80 (1991) was a historic event which provided a sure guarantee for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution and the cause of the Songun revolution which were pioneered on Mt. Paektu, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 He cherished it as his lifelong mission to accomplish President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary cause with arms without fail and performed the exploits in the history of founding the Juche-oriented army while covering the road of Songun leadership for decades together with the President.
					
					 He set forth the policy of modeling the entire army on Kimilsungism as required by the developing revolution advancing under the unfurled banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism in the early 1970s and thus provided a radical milestone in the struggle for developing the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 He made the greatest efforts to develop the Korean People's Army into an invincible revolutionary army with his iron faith that peace and socialism are guaranteed by strong arms during the days of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state and the matchless military power and handed over the Paektusan army as the best legacy of the revolution. This is the feats performed by him, the peerlessly Songun brilliant commander, in the history of the nation.
					
					 It is the noblest exploits performed by him before the country and the people that he successfully settled the issue of succession to the leadership to accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution with arms which was pioneered with arms.
					
					 The DPRK was sure to win as there are the wise leadership of the Party which is glorifying his idea of the Songun revolution and exploits, the powerful Juche-oriented revolutionary armed forces and the service personnel and people rallied around the Party single-mindedly.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime Slammed for Strengthening Cooperation to Stifle DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime Slammed for Strengthening Cooperation to Stifle DPRK
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S., Japan and south Korea recently had the 8th discussion on security in Seoul under the pretext of "promoting cooperation on security."
					 Earlier, the south Korean puppet regime held bilateral talks with Japan, at which they shared "intelligence on the nukes and missiles of the north" for the first time after the conclusion of the agreement on protecting military intelligence.
					
					 Against this backdrop, there took place the first meeting of the "extended deterrence strategy council" in Washington at which the puppet regime discussed the way of intensifying military deterrence, diplomatic pressure and sanctions on the DPRK and the issue of rotation deployment of the U.S. nuclear strategic assets on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun Monday comments that the south Korean puppet regime's strengthening cooperation to stifle the DPRK with the U.S. and Japan under the pretext of the non-existent "threat from the north" is an act of treachery to zealously support the strategy of their masters for domination of the Asian-Pacific region and their moves for forming the triangular military alliance.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 While recklessly resorting to the offensive to stifle the DPRK in conspiracy with foreign forces, the puppet regime is making desperate efforts to lead their racket for the confrontation with the DPRK to reckless invasion.
					
					 The puppet warmongers made a decision on the rotation deployment of the U.S. nuclear strategic assets in south Korea, strengthening the military cooperation such as regular missile warning drill with their U.S. and Japanese masters. This was prompted by the adventurous intention to attain their ambition to invade the north with a preemptive nuclear strike.
					
					 Those actions are nothing but the last-ditch efforts of the living corpse. 
					
					 Nobody is more wretched than the group of traitors getting keen on hysteric racket for confrontation even though their days are numbered.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed by Syrian Media
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed by Syrian Media
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Syrian media carried special write-ups from December 15 to 17 to observe the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 SANA in an article illustrated with his photo said:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il was always optimistic about the future.
					
					 All his ideas and lines reflected future demand.
					
					 He gave top priority to the interests of the people and devoted himself to meeting them.
					
					 He was a tender-hearted father who showed warm loving care for the people.
					
					 That's why the Korean people deeply trusted and followed him.
					
					 He led the Korean people to the road of socialism, resolutely smashing the moves of the U.S. and its vassal forces to check the advance of the DPRK.
					
					 The Central Broadcasting Service in an article illustrated with photos showing revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il noted that the DPRK achieved one victory after another in the ceaseless showdown with the U.S. which styled itself the "only superpower" in the world, under his Songun leadership.
					
					 The Central Radio also aired a special program dealing with his revolutionary career and exploits.
					
					 The newspapers Al Baath, Al Thawrah and Tishrin introduced the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and his noble outlook on the people and the future.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Slovenian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Slovenian Body
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was posted by the Slovenian committee for remembering HE Kim Jong Il on its website on Dec. 16 on the fifth anniversary of his demise.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun-based revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is an effective political mode in the present era that has carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line on attaching importance to the army, and a scientific and revolutionary line and political mode most correctly meeting the requirements of the times and the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Nordic Political Parties and Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Nordic Political Parties and Organizations
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A joint remembrance meeting of Nordic progressive political parties and friendly organizations was held in Stockholm on Dec. 17, the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display on the front wall of the venue of the meeting was a picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together.
					
					 There were also photos on the revolutionary careers and exploits of the great leaders and books and photos introducing the achievements of the Korean people in the building of a powerful socialist country under the guidance of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the meeting were personages and members of political parties, organizations for the study of the Juche idea and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in Nordic countries such as Sweden, Finland and Denmark, the DPRK ambassador to Sweden and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants in the meeting laid floral baskets and bouquets before the picture of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association; Pekka Kotkasaari, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society; Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association; and other speakers highly praised Kim Jong Il for developing the immortal Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and faithfully carrying forward his revolutionary cause.
					
					 Appreciating him for devoting his all to the people, they said he made a great contribution to defending socialism and reunifying Korea and achieving the cause of global independence.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Then a statement titled "Distinguished exploits of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il" was released.

articles.title: Discurso resumen de Kim Jong Un en la Primera Conferencia de Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido
articles.content:
Discurso resumen de Kim Jong Un en la Primera Conferencia de Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, pronuncio el dia 25 el discurso resumen "Para fortalecer el comite de base del partido" en la tercera jornada de la Primera Conferencia de los Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido.
					El dijo que el CC del PTC convoco por primera vez en la historia de nuestro partido la conferencia de ese tipo de acuerdo con las demandas de la revolucion en desarrollo y le aprecia tanto como al Congreso del partido.
					
					Se refirio a algunos problemas que resultan importantes en mejorar e intensificar en el futuro las labores del comite de base del partido.
					
					Son muy importantes la posicion y el papel del comite de base del partido en fortalecer y desarrollar mas el PTC como gran partido kimilsungista-kimjongilista conforme a la demanda de la nueva epoca de la revolucion jucheana y acelerar energicamente la construccion de potencia socialista, apunto el Presidente del PTC y continuo:
					
					Solo cuando se fortalezca el comite de base del partido, se puede formar a todos los militantes como verdaderos kimilsungistas y kimjongilistas fieles a la idea y direccion del partido y desarrollar el partido como organizacion revolucionaria con invencible poderio mediante la fortificacion de su base.
					
					Hoy en dia, fortalecer el comite de base del partido y elevar su combatividad se presentan como mayor prioridad en la lucha por frustrar las obstinadas maniobras antisocialistas de los imperialistas y otras fuerzas hostiles que se hacen cada dia mas abiertas, materializar la linea de la identificacion de todo el partido con el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo, presentada en el VII Congreso del Partido, y llevar a feliz termino la causa socialista del Juche.
					
					Conforme al proposito del Comite Central del Partido de conceder importancia a los comites de base del partido, estos deben fortalecerse como filas de flor y nata y movilizar con energia a los funcionarios, militantes y trabajadores al cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de potencia socialista, de manera que se abra la nueva era dorada de consolidacion de si mismos.
					
					En la actualidad, el deber principal de esos comites es cumplir con su responsabilidad y papel como principales unidades del partido en la lucha por materializar la resolucion del VII Congreso del Partido bajo la bandera de la identificacion de toda la sociedad con el kimilsungismo- kimjongilismo.
					
					Antes que nada, los comites de base deben cumplir con su mision y deber como Estado Mayor politico de las unidades correspondientes en la materializacion de la idea del partido y la defensa de sus politicas.
					
					En particular, deben dar el enfoque de las labores partidistas a cumplir cabalmente las politicas del partido y las principales tareas de la revolucion que les competen a sus sectores y unidades.
					
					Los comites de base del partido en las unidades logisticas del Ejercito Popular y otras instituciones de las fuerzas armadas deben desplegar de manera vigorosa y combativa las labores partidistas y contribuir mucho al mejoramiento de la calidad de vida de los militares.
					
					Todos los comites de base del partido deben cumplir sin falta las tareas militares asignadas a sus unidades en acato a la linea del partido de dar importancia a los asuntos militares.
					
					A fin de cumplir con exito sus tareas revolucionarias, deben elevar al maximo la capacidad de autofortalecimiento tomando como factores principales el poderio espiritual de las masas, la ciencia y tecnica y la intendencia.
					
					Deben ayudar y estimular a los funcionarios administrativos y economicos para que desempenen perfectamente sus papeles  en el cumplimiento de sus tareas revolucionarias.
					
					Han de dar grandes fuerzas a las labores interiores del partido tomando como cuestion principal el establecimiento del sistema de direccion unica del partido para multiplicar el poderio combativo del partido y las filas revolucionarias.
					
					Es necesario redoblar la vigilancia sobre las tentativas de los enemigos de descomponernos por dentro y los fenomenos anormales que enturbian la opinion publica y librar una lucha intensa contra ellos. 
					
					Hay que dirigir correctamente las labores de las organizaciones de masas para que ellas cumplan bien su papel de correa de transmision y entidad auxiliar del partido.
					
					Sobre todo, resulta imperioso concentrar las fuerzas en la direccion sobre las labores de la Union de la Juventud para que sus organizaciones manifiesten el poderio de destacamento explorador y de flanco del partido en la lucha por materializar la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Actualmente, la tarea central de la labor partidista de los comites del partido en las comunas de zonas rurales es intensificar ideo-politicamente las trincheras del campo socialista y alcanzar, cueste lo que cueste, la meta de produccion cerealera presentada por el partido.  
					
					Para hacer que los comites de base del partido cumplan excelentemente su deber y mision asumidos ante el partido y la revolucion, es preciso elevar decisivamente la responsabilidad y el papel de sus presidentes. 
					
					Los departamentos del CC del PTC, los comites del PTC en las provincias, ciudades y distritos y los comites partidistas, que cumplen la misma funcion, deben concentrarse en los quehaceres por fortalecer los comites de base del partido en acato a la idea y orientacion del partido de dar importancia a ellos y consolidarlos. 
					
					Hace falta lanzar una fuerte campana para erradicar la burocratizacion administrativa en las labores partidistas. 
					
					Al final, Kim Jong Un exhorto a todos los participantes y a todos los presidentes de comite de base a trabajar con abnegacion por el gran partido y el gran pueblo y por la victoria de la sagrada causa revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso de clausura en la Primera Conferencia de Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso de clausura en la Primera Conferencia de Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, dirigio la Primera Conferencia de los Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido, sesionada del dia 23 al 25, y pronuncio el discurso de clausura.
					El dijo que en el presente conclave se debatieron con sinceridad los problemas importantes surgidos en fortalecer el comite de base del partido y elevar por todos los medios su funcion combativa y papel.
					
					Continuo que a traves de la conferencia, se han comprendido y confirmado otra vez la importante posicion y papel del comite de base del partido en las labores partidistas y el cumplimiento de la causa socialista, y se han manifestado patentemente la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de elevar el papel de los comites de base del partido para multiplicar el invencible poderio y la combatividad del PTC y acelerar la construccion de potencia socialista.
					
					Expresando la satisfaccion por la conclusion perfecta de la conferencia conforme a los requisitos de desarrollo de nuestro partido y revolucion, envio agradecimiento cordial a los participantes y a todos los militantes del partido y habitantes que se esforzaron mucho por la celebracion exitosa del evento.
					
					Subrayo que la Primera Conferencia de los Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido se registrara en la historia de nuestro partido como cita significativa y gloriosa que abrio el atajo para desarrollar nuestro partido como organizacion kimilsungista-kimjongilista y llevar a feliz termino la causa socialista.
					
					El espiritu principal del presente conclave reside en registrar viraje trascendental en la lucha por desarrollar nuestro partido y materializar la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC al consolidar los comites de base como filas invencibles y aumentar por todos los medios su combatividad, apunto y llamo a todos los presidentes de comite de base del partido a producir un auge revolucionario en las labores partidistas y la construccion de potencia socialista al materializar consecuentemente ese espiritu grabandolo bien en la mente.
					
					Los participantes en la conferencia deben levantar la oleada de innovaciones y avances continuos en sus unidades con el mismo espiritu e impetu, manifestados en la campana de 200 dias, siendo abanderados y ejecutores tenaces de la ofensiva general que abran la brecha de avance en los sectores de construccion de potencia socialista, remarco.
					
					Tenemos por delante un largo camino que recorrer e inmensas tareas que cumplir, dijo y agrego que en el trayecto de lucha que sigue siendo ardua debido a las maniobras obstruccionistas de las fuerzas hostiles de toda indole, el partido confia y se apoya en amplias masas populares.
					
					Deposito gran esperanza en los comites de base del partido y sus presidentes que cumplen la linea y las politicas del partido organizando y movilizando bien las inagotables fuerzas de las masas populares.
					
					Convencido de que se lograran nuevos cambios en el desarrollo del partido y la construccion de potencia socialista gracias a los empenos abnegados de los participantes y los presidentes de comite de base del partido, el Presidente del PTC declaro el cierre de la conferencia.

articles.title: Clausurada la Primera Conferencia de los Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido
articles.content:
Clausurada la Primera Conferencia de los Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurada el dia 25 la Primera Conferencia de los Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido que cumplio exitosamente su trabajo.
					El Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, dirigio la tercera jornada del presente conclave.
					
					En la ocasion hubo intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores se refirieron a los exitos y experiencias logrados en el proceso de consolidar la unidad monolitica y mejorar la facultad y papel de las organizaciones del partido.
					
					Apuntaron por unanimidad que constataron una vez mas la verdad de que si se consolidan los comites de base, unidades principales del partido, sera fortalecido todo el partido y se podra lograr la victoria de la causa revolucionaria, como lo aclararan los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y lo instruyera el Presidente del PTC, Kim Jong Un.
					
					Continuaron que lograron exitos en la materializacion de los legados de los grandes Lideres y las politicas del partido al organizar y dirigir bien la vida partidista de los militantes y movilizar al maximo el poderio espiritual de las masas anteponiendo con firmeza la labor ideologica.
					
					En acato a la idea del partido de dar importancia a la juventud, los comites de base del partido prestan gran atencion a la direccion partidista sobre la labor de la union juvenil y a la educacion para los jovenes y forman asi firmemente a los miembros de nueva generacion como fidedignos trabajadores, que llevaran adelante la tradicion de fidelidad de sus unidades, y como protagonistas de la potencia juvenil Paektusan, agregaron.
					
					Recordaron que hicieron repercutir mas alto las canciones de agradecimiento al partido madre y las vivas al PTC, al enfocar la labor partidista a los trabajos para poner al alcance de todas las personas el noble proposito del partido, que da primacia a los intereses y comodidades del pueblo considerandolos como absolutos, y sus politicas populares.
					
					En la ocasion fueron criticados los errores y desviaciones observados en las labores de algunas organizaciones partidistas de base y tomadas las medidas para superarlos.
					
					Y fueron expresadas las decisiones firmes de contribuir activamente a la conversion de todo el partido y toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo y kimjongilismo, al elevar extraordinariamente la combatividad de los comites de base del partido guardando en el corazon el proposito del Comite Central del Partido que convoco la conferencia de los presidentes de los mismos comites, comandantes de campana del partido, en el importante periodo historico de cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Kim Jong Un pronuncio el discurso resumen.
					
					Escuchando las instrucciones programaticas del Presidente del PTC, los participantes sintieron el gran honor y la responsabilidad de encargados directos de abrir la ruta de avance en la lucha de cumplimiento de la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC, al producir viraje decisivo en las labores de los comites de base conforme a las demandas de la nueva epoca de la revolucion del Juche.
					
					Kim Jong Un pronuncio el discurso de clausura.
					
					La conferencia, convocada con la dimension de todo el partido despues del VII Congreso del PTC, fue la gran cita significativa que preparo la historica hoja de ruta para fortalecer el PTC como organizacion kimilsungista-kimjongilista y agrupacion vivaracha y combativa y acelerar la construccion de potencia socialista.
					
					El conclave, transcurrido bajo la guia del Presidente del PTC, se registrara en la historia de esta entidad politica como cita de ofensiva general de la revolucion que estimulo mucho a los militantes, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y habitantes quienes bajo la guia de PTC avanzan a todo galope hacia la victoria final de la construccion de potencia socialista y la causa de revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias a Putin
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias a Putin
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 26 un mensaje de condolencias a Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, presidente de la Federacion Rusa, en relacion con que se produjo una gran perdida humana por la caida de un avion que viajaba a Siria llevandose el Conjunto Artistico Academico del Ejercito Ruso Alexandrov.
					Expresando al destinatario, las victimas y sus familiares el profundo pesame y condolencias, el remitente deseo de todo corazon que se resarciera lo mas pronto posible la tristeza de los familiares de las victimas y se recobrara la estabilidad.

articles.title: Efectuado acto festivo de obreros y miembros de FGSC
articles.content:
Efectuado acto festivo de obreros y miembros de FGSC
Songrim, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en el Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae el acto festivo de los obreros y los miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea por el 5o aniversario del nombramiento del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los funcionarios de la rama interesada, los obreros del Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae y los funcionarios y miembros de la FGSC.
					
					Hubo el informe de Ju Yong Gil, presidente del CC de la FGSC, e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores subrayaron que el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, quien estando junto con el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el largo camino del Songun recibio la infinita confianza y respeto de todo el ejercito y el pueblo, dirigio sabiamente las labores del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, abriendo nueva era de victoria y cambio a ser transmitida en los anales de la patria.
					
					Y enfatizaron en que al dar a los obreros coreanos el noble titulo de la heroica clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, el Maximo Dirigente consolido la FGSC como la autentica union sindical de los grandes Lideres.
					
					Los oradores exhortaron a luchar con dinamismo para adelantar la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, uniendose monoliticamente en torno al Maximo Dirigente.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela tentativas malas de EE.UU. y Surcorea por ubicacion de THAAD
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela tentativas malas de EE.UU. y Surcorea por ubicacion de THAAD
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea insiste en que la ubicacion de THAAD se terminara antes de mayo del ano siguiente puesto que ya estan asentadas las instalaciones de base como la electricidad, el acueducto, la carretera de entrada en la zona determinado y no se tardara mucho la construccion de otros establecimientos.
					Tambien, el comandante de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea, Brooks afirmo categoricamente que la ubicacion de THAAD se concluira dentro de unos meses.
					
					Al principio, la ubicacion de THAAD estaba prevista a finales de 2017. Pero, ahora tratan de ubicarlo con anticipacion de 7 meses.
					
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico el dia 25 un comentario individual que senala como sigue:
					
					Al tomar en consideracion el hecho de que el proyecto de dimision de Park Geun-hye aprobado el dia 9 en la "Asamblea Nacional" se decidira finalmente en la "Corte Constitucional" dentro de 6 meses, podemos saber que Estados Unidos y los cabecillos de la capa militar del Sur de Corea se apresuran para concluir la ubicacion de THAAD dentro de ese plazo.
					
					A Estados Unidos, que quiere convertir el Sur de Corea en su eterna colona y en la base avanzada nuclear para reprimir a las potencias de la region de Asia-Pacifico, no le gusta el arruinamiento de la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye que es muy fiel al imperio.
					
					Nadie sabe cuando la indignada opinion publica surcoreana anti-Park Geun-hye se cambiara con el impetu antiyanqui.
					
					Por eso, EE.UU. intenta llevar a cabo a toda costa la ubicacion de THAAD durante el mandato de la horda de Park y esta se esfuerza por dilatar su gobernacion mediante la obediencia a su amo gringo.

articles.title: Minju Joson comenta las peroratas de Hwang Kyo An
articles.content:
Minju Joson comenta las peroratas de Hwang Kyo An
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Hwang Kyo An declaro a los medios de prensa que no cambiara las "principales politicas diplomaticas" de la traidora de Park Geun-hye como la ubicacion de THAAD y el "convenio sobre las consoladoras" con Japon y anadio que "se ejecutaran sin cambio alguno las politicas anteriores".
					El periodico Minju Joson divulgo el dia 25 un comentario individual subrayando que las mencionadas "politicas anteriores" se caracterizan de punto a cabo por la confrontacion anti-RPDC, el servilismo a las potencias y la vendepatria.
					
					La ubicacion de THAAD y la adopcion del "convenio sobre las consoladoras" y del convenio de proteccion de informaciones militares con Japon constituyen un producto de la politica de la traidora Park Geun-hye que persiguio damnificar a toda costa a los connacionales en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras y una parte de la estrategia norteamericana de dominar a Asia, insiste el periodico y continua:
					
					A los que practican forzosamente la politica de confrontacion anti-RPDC, servilismo a las grandes potencias y vendepatria de la traidora Park Geun-hye, merece el castigo de la opinion publica.
					
					Lo comprueba el hecho de que diversos estratos surcoreanos estan demandando fuertemente destituir ahora mismo a Hwang Kyo An quien intenta repetir la politica de traidora Park Geun-hye.
					
					Todos los traidores que desafian a la aspiracion y anhelo nacionales confabulando con las fuerzas extranjeras agresivas no podran evitar el destino tragico.
